snippet: For reasons both practical and personal, the Brooklyn Nets will practice in New Jersey and will not be living in Brooklyn, at least for their inaugural season.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets are set to begin their inaugural season at Barclays Center, but practices will continue to be held at their training center in Rutherford, NJ, making it impractical for the players to live in Brooklyn.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Lynn Zinser, Judy Battista, Tyler Kepner and David Waldstein.

lead_paragraph: For reasons both practical and personal, the Brooklyn Nets will practice in New Jersey and will not be living in Brooklyn, at least for their inaugural season.

headline.seo: For Nets Players, Play in Brooklyn, Practice in New Jersey, Live In ...
headline.main: Nets Will Play in Brooklyn but Will Practice and Live Outside Borough
